summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; revising water rates and charges; revising the rates of credit for qualified low-income customers; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1991 Budget of the Water Department by appropriation of balances accumulating in the Water Fund; revising certain revenue estimates contained Municipal Code Sections 21.04.430, 21.04.440, 21.76.030, and 21.76.040, in connection therewith.
